function.name: entity_recognition
function.description: extract all entities related to machine learning tasks, datasets, methods and benchmarks.

datasets.description: A collection of data used to train, pretrain or fine-tune a machine learning model.

methods.description: A machine learning model or algorithm. This also includes the type of model (e.g. transformer, CNN, RNN, etc.) and other relevant components like optimization algorithms, loss functions, etc.

evaluation.description: They describe how a model is evaluated. This includes metrics, benchmarks, etc.

tasks.description: A machine learning task (e.g. classification, question answering, summarization, etc.).
